locationId.title: Weather Location
locationId.description: Select a weather location. If not set, uses the primary location.

dayOffset.title: Day Offset
dayOffset.description: Number of days from today (0 = today, 1 = tomorrow).

validation.min: Day offset must be at least 0
validation.max: Day offset must be at most 7

icon.title: Custom Icon
icon.description: Override the weather icon with a custom icon name.

unit.title: Unit Suffix
unit.description: Unit suffix to display after the value (e.g., °C, %, km/h).
